title: Punjab CM, LG minister call on PM
content:
LAHORE, Feb 16 (APP): Punjab Chief Minister Sardar Usman Buzdar along with provincial Minister for Local Government and Community Development Department Mian Mahmood-ur-Rasheed Wednesday called on Prime Minister Imran Khan.
During the meeting, strategy and other related issues over the upcoming local bodiesâ€™ elections in the province were discussed.
The prime minister directed for expediting the public canvassing campaign and activating of the party workers at the lower tier to ensure success in the upcoming LG polls.
